    self.visible = False
    
    self.pos = (-310, 120)

@onmouse('down', anywhere = True)
@onkey('any')
def do_continue(self, *args):
    if stage.mode is None:
        stage.mode = stage.view = 'Map'
        stage.clear_drawings()
        stage.update_map()
